/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars, buses, and motorcycles, indicating a busy urban environment. Buildings of different sizes and designs flank the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many urban areas. Trees and bushes add a touch of greenery to the scene, contrasting with the concrete structures. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day.
